features.description: Restricts or customizes content shown to users based on their geographic location.
features.analysis: Due to GDPR and CCPA, content shown to users in the EU and California must comply with local privacy and data protection laws. Some countries require additional filtering for political or sensitive content.
features.recommendation: Implement geo-specific compliance logic to ensure content filtering meets all local regulations.

features.description: Delivers ads to users based on their location.
features.analysis: Advertising to users in the EU must comply with GDPR consent requirements. In the US, state-level laws like CCPA apply. Some regions restrict certain ad categories.
features.recommendation: Review ad targeting logic for compliance with local laws, especially for minors.
